NonDefaultPluginBanner.en: (VPetLLM is not set as default chat interface, features disabled)

PromptLanguageTooltip.en: Set according to the model's preferred language. For Chinese models like DeepSeek, 'ç®€ä½“ä¸­æ–‡' is recommended.

ClearRecordsConfirm.en: Are you sure you want to clear all memory records? This action cannot be undone.

ClearRecordsSuccess.en: All memory records have been cleared successfully.

ChannelManagementDesc.en: Support adding multiple OpenAI channels. The program will automatically rotate API Keys to distribute request frequency.

EnableVisionTooltip.en: Enable vision capability for this channel to process images and screenshots

ChannelManagementDesc.en: Support adding multiple OpenAI channels. You can enter multiple API Keys (one per line) within a channel, and the program will automatically rotate them to distribute request frequency.

EnableVisionTooltip.en: Enable vision capability for this channel to process images and screenshots

ApiEndpointNote.en: Note: Please provide the correct API endpoint URL.

ChannelManagementDesc.en: Support adding multiple Gemini channels. You can enter multiple API Keys (one per line) within a channel, and the program will automatically rotate them to distribute request frequency.

EnableVisionTooltip.en: Enable vision capability for this channel to process images and screenshots
Enable vision capability for this channel to process images and screenshots

EnableExtendedStateToolTip.en: When enabled, AI can detect if the pet is sleeping, working, studying, or playing. This provides more context for better responses.

ReduceInputTokenUsageToolTip.en: When enabled, pet status will be moved from system role to user role in format [Time;Status], which helps hit cache and reduce token usage. Compatible with context editor.

EnableLiveModeToolTip.en: When enabled, tool and plugin results will be returned immediately without waiting for previous actions to complete. When disabled (default), results will be queued and processed sequentially with aggregation.

LimitStateChangesToolTip.en: When enabled, limits all individual state changes from LLM to a maximum of 20% and prevents negative values.

EnableAIRetainCountTooltip.en: When enabled, AI will automatically determine how many recent messages to additionally retain during summarization for seamless conversation continuity

WeightDecayTurnsToolTip.en: Number of conversation turns required to decrease weight by 1. Default: 1 (weight decreases by 1 every conversation). Example: 3 means it takes 3 conversations to lose 1 weight point.

MaxRecordsLimitToolTip.en: Maximum number of memory records to keep. When exceeded, records with lowest weight will be automatically removed. If weights are equal, older records are removed first. Default: 10. Range: 1-100.

EnableVPetSettingsControl.en: Allow pet to control some VPet settings

EnableMediaPlayback.en: Allow pet to play media (video/music) via mpv

ToolsDescription.en: This list is for configuring MCP (Model-Controlled Plugin) tools

ManagementDescription.en: Configure and manage your AI tools. Add custom API endpoints and tool configurations.
Extend your AI assistant functionality by installing and managing various plugins.

DeleteConfirm.en: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

Message.en: Are you sure you want to uninstall this plugin? This will delete the plugin file and cannot be undone.

PluginDetectedWarning.en: âš  {0} plugin detected and enabled. Built-in TTS will be automatically skipped.

UseQueueDownload.en: Use Queue Download Mode (for APIs that don't support concurrent requests)

VolumeGainTip.en: Adjust audio volume in dB. Positive values increase volume, negative values decrease volume. 0dB means no change.

DIYTTSDescription.en: DIY TTS uses JSON configuration files for setup, supporting powerful customization features.

DIYTTSFeatures.en: Supports custom request headers, request body, request methods and other parameters. User-Agent will be automatically restricted to VPetLLM.

VoiceTip.en: Enter the voice model ID to switch between different voice models (e.g., 36 for female voice 1, 37 for male voice 1, etc.)

Description.en: URL TTS supports GET and POST request methods and multiple voice types.
Supports OpenAI TTS API format services like fish.audio. Requires a valid API Key.

BaseUrlTip.en: Please enter the complete TTS API URL including the full path (e.g., https://api.fish.audio/v1/tts)

RefreshModelsFail.en: Failed to get model list, please check API Key and network connection.

Description.en: Supports GPT-SoVITS v2-v4 API versions. The system will automatically detect supported versions and available models from the server.

VersionTip.en: After selecting a version, the model list for that version will be automatically loaded

ModelTip.en: Load available model list from server

LanguageTip.en: Automatically displays supported languages based on the selected model, this language will be used as prompt_text_lang

SplitMethodTip.en: Select text splitting method, affects speech synthesis fluency

HotkeyDescription.en: Click the capture button, then press your desired hotkey combination.

RecordingDeviceTip.en: Select the microphone device for voice input

Description.en: Supports OpenAI Whisper API format speech recognition services (OpenAI, SiliconFlow, etc.)

ModelTip.en: Select Soniox speech recognition model, click refresh button to get latest model list

LanguageTip.en: Select speech recognition language, language list updates dynamically based on selected model

Description.en: Soniox provides high-precision speech recognition services with support for multiple languages

HotkeyResetSuccess.en: Hotkey has been reset to default: Win + Alt + V

ProxyUrlNote.en: Example: https://ghfast.top (for accelerating GitHub access in regions with connectivity issues)

EnableDescription.en: When enabled, touching VPet's head or body will trigger intelligent feedback

CooldownDescription.en: Cooldown time prevents overly frequent interactions, recommended setting is 1-3 seconds.

EnableTooltip.en: When users purchase items, the pet will generate personalized feedback responses through AI.

EnableDescription.en: When enabled, VPet will provide intelligent feedback when you buy items for it

RecommendationDescription.en: VPet will suggest items to buy based on its current needs

EnableTooltip.en: Display a quick action panel next to the desktop pet

AutoHideTooltip.en: Automatically reduce opacity when not interacting

VoiceInputDisabled.en: Voice input not enabled, please configure ASR in settings

ScreenshotDisabled.en: Screenshot not enabled, please configure in settings

EnableTooltip.en: Enable screenshot capture with hotkey or sidebar button

HotkeyDescription.en: Click the capture button, then press your desired hotkey combination.

ProcessingModeTooltip.en: Choose how to process captured screenshots

ProcessingModeTip.en: Native: Send image directly to vision LLM; Preprocessing: Analyze image first, then send description to main LLM; OCR: Extract text

AutoSendTooltip.en: Automatically send the screenshot to LLM after capture

Description.en: OCR mode uses OpenAI Vision API to recognize text in images

EnableVisionTooltip.en: Enable vision capability for this LLM channel to process images

VisionNotSupported.en: Current LLM channel does not support vision. Please enable vision in channel settings or switch to OCR mode.

Description.en: Native multimodal mode sends screenshots directly to vision-capable LLM for analysis.

PreprocessDescription.en: Preprocessing mode: First analyze the image with a multimodal model to generate a description, then send the description with your question to the main LLM for a consistent conversation experience.

EnableVisionTip.en: Please ensure vision capability (EnableVision) is enabled for the corresponding node in LLM settings.

ProviderTip.en: Free channel requires no configuration; Vision-enabled channels require EnableVision to be enabled in LLM settings

VisionChannelsProviderTip.en: Vision-enabled channels require EnableVision to be enabled for the corresponding node in LLM settings

NoVisionNodes.en: No vision nodes available. Please enable EnableVision in LLM settings.

LoadBalanceTip.en: When multiple nodes are selected, one will be randomly chosen for each request. If it fails, another node will be tried automatically.

ImagePromptTip.en: This prompt is built-in and cannot be modified

Title.en: Screenshot Capture - Press Enter to confirm, Escape to cancel

CaptureFailedMessage.en: Failed to capture screenshot. Please try again.

OCRFailedMessage.en: Failed to extract text from image. Please check OCR settings.

NoTextDetected.en: No text detected in the image.

HotkeyRegistrationFailed.en: Failed to register screenshot hotkey. The key combination may be in use by another application.

PromptPlaceholder.en: Enter your question about the image...

NoVisionNodesAvailable.en: No vision nodes available. Please select at least one vision-enabled node in settings.
